text: The ceiling is very high with lots of gigantic ceiling fans to air up the place. Very clean and spacious setup at the Food court. The Buangkok MRT Station serves this mall.
Spacious mall with great F&B and spotted this beautiful flowershop inside the new bus interchange near exit 3
First time to here at Sengkang Grand Mall after I alighting from Buangkok MRT heading to mall. Was opening 2 years ago back March 2023 to have big atmosphere around here.

Physically the mall looks big. It is spacious,  unfortunately the downfall is without aircond. shops and restaurants have AC. I tried few times eating at the so claimed ‘biggest hawker centre’ . But Each time I felt made the wrong choice. Outside weather already hot. Look forward to a cool mall but not in Sengkang Grand mall. It's hot with poor ventilation. I pity those stall holders and wonder how they deal the such condition daily.

Spacious mall with ample space to move around. Hawker centre, supermarket and community centre are within the mall itself.

Direct access to Buangkok mrt
